nodes.text: Firefighter battle droids were specialized B1-series battle droids equipped with enhanced heat shielding that were programmed and equipped to fight fires. Notable for their distinctive paint and heavy backpacks, which featured the numbers 72066 running down either side, they carried fire hoses that sprayed fire-repellent foam. During the Clone Wars, several of them served aboard the Malevolence, a Subjugator-class heavy cruiser that served as the flagship of General Grievous. Decades later, R0-GR, the self-proclaimed last of the B1 battle droids, included the firefighter units in his book droidography. In the book, R0-GR claimed the firefighters were brave and that it was a result of them being from the B1-series.
Firefighter battle droids first appeared in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars season one episode, "Destroy Malevolence."

Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know states that the droids were 1.91 meters tall. However, Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Character Encyclopedia - Join the Battle! states that the droids were 1.93 meters.
